description: This source file defines the OceanTheme class which provides customized light and dark ThemeData instances for a Flutter application. It encapsulates color schemes, text themes, and widget themes tailored to the ocean-inspired palette and UI aesthetic.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: Provides static methods and properties to generate light and dark ThemeData for an ocean-inspired UI theme, encapsulating color schemes, typography, and widget styling.

methods.name: _textTheme
methods.description: Generates a customized TextTheme with a consistent, rounded, modern font style based on the provided color.

methods.name: _lightTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData for the light theme, configuring color scheme, UI component styles, and page transitions.

methods.name: _darkTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData for the dark theme, with appropriate color adjustments for dark mode.
